6.title: Avada Classic
6.text:
Avada has been the #1 selling theme for more than 6 years, making it the most trusted and complete WordPress theme on the market.

We are dedicated to providing you with the best experience possible.

9.title: Top Sliding Bar
9.text: This Sliding Bar can be switched on or off in theme options, and can take any widget you throw at it or even fill it with your custom HTML Code. Its perfect for grabbing the attention of your viewers. Choose between 1, 2, 3 or 4 columns, set the background color, widget divider color, activate transparency, a top border or fully disable it on desktop and mobile.

19.title: Newsletter
19.text: Sign-up to get the latest news and update information. Don't worry, we won't send spam!
